means: 使多样化，多样化( diversify的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The company's troubles started only when it diversified into new products.
sentence.Network_cn: 当公司增加新产品时，麻烦才开始的。

sentence.Network_en: The college biology department has diversified by adding new courses in biotechnology.
sentence.Network_cn: 该学院生物系通过增加生物技术方面的新课程而变得多样化.

sentence.Network_en: Take grain as the key link, develop a diversified economy and ensure an all - round development.
sentence.Network_cn: 以粮为纲, 多种经营, 全面 发展.

entry.tran: 增加…的品种;从事多种经营;（使）多样化
entry.def: When an organization or person diversifies into other things, or diversifies their range of something, they increase the variety of things that they do or make.

example.ex: The company's troubles started only when it diversified into new products...
example.tran: 当公司增加新产品时，麻烦才开始的。

example.ex: Manufacturers have been encouraged to diversify...
example.tran: 制造商们被鼓励要做到产品多样化。

means.word_mean: 1. having variety of character or form or components; or having increased variety;

sentences.sentence: "a diversified musical program ranging from classical to modern"

auth_sentence.content: Its summits are finely figured, and richly diversified.
